        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

source.abbcc87d:
# Image Classification using Fastai

![Dogs](https://i.imgur.com/AdcAwvl.jpg)


**Our Task is to classify the different breeds or kinds of dogs. We are using fast ai to do the training. This kernel is based on the course provided by fastai. The founder Jeremy Howard himself is leading the lecture. View it** [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XfoYk_Z5AkI).
